entry.title: Dracula699/SchoolManagementSystem-ERP-: A lightweight and beginner-friendly ERP system built just for fun and learning! This student dashboard mimics a real school management panel ‚Äî displaying key information like student name, class, attendance, school circulars, and academic notes. Designed as a personal experiment to explore backend logic, data handling, and dashboard design.
entry.content: A lightweight and beginner-friendly ERP system built just for fun and learning! This student dashboard mimics a real school management panel ‚Äî displaying key information like student name, class, attendance, school circulars, and academic notes. Designed as a personal experiment to explore backend logic, data handling, and dashboard design.

entry.title: Tej619/Textify: Textify is a lightweight real-time chat application designed for quick and easy conversations.
